titleStmt.title: Detur pulchriori, or, A poem in the praise of the Vniversity of Oxford
titleStmt.author: F. V. (Francis Vaux)
Vernon, Francis, 1637?-1677.

notesStmt.note: One of the prefatory verses is inscribed to the author "F.V."
Also erroneously attributed to Francis Vernon.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
